subject: running junit programmatically.. and opening junit view
msgSnippet: Hi I am working on a plug-in which has context menu to run junit test[similar to what we have for default editor in eclipse]. For this I have to run junit test
messageBody:
Hi

I am working on a plug-in which has context menu to run junit
test[similar to what we have for default editor in eclipse]. For this
I have to run junit test programmatically and open its corresponding
Juit view. To run I am using

result = org.junit.runner.JUnitCore.runClasses(test.class);
System.out.println(result.getRunCount());
System.out.println(result.getRunTime());
System.out.println(result.getFailureCount());

OR

junit.textui.TestRunner.run(test.class);

Both of these well tell me the result of that JUnit test on Console.

Question: How can call or open the junit view after running Junit test
on the class? How can I connect them. Could anyone suggest me some
hints to do this.

Thanks
Neelesh
